Campus Visits

Southwest Gas
July 11, 9-11 am, MC 117A | Interviews
Southwest Gas Corporation is an investor-owned utility based in Las Vegas, Nevada that provides natural gas service to approximately 1.9 million customers in parts of Arizona, Nevada, and California. They will be holding interviews for a construction intern, Job ID# 40546. All construction management students are invited to apply through Career Navigator.
